org.TagCloud

Class ColorInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.TagCloud.ColorInterpolator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackToWhiteGradient, SampleGradientColors, ShadesOfLightBlue, YellowBrownGradient

    public abstract class ColorInterpolator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColorProvider
    This abstract class can interpolate a color from a set of color points based on weight 0 to 1. Extending classed must provide an array with the colors to use in the getColorPoints method.

      Constructors

      ColorInterpolator()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getColor(float weight, int value)
      This method returns a color along a multi point color gradiant.
      abstract java.awt.Color[] getColorPoints()
      The extending class must implement this method and provide an array of colors

    • Method Detail

      • getColorPoints

        public abstract java.awt.Color[] getColorPoints()
        The extending class must implement this method and provide an array of colors
        Returns:
        The array of colors between which to interpolate

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor(float weight,
                      int value)
        This method returns a color along a multi point color gradiant. The Gradiant color points are specified by an array of Colors. The Array must have at least 2 color entries. The interpolation uses the weight parameter.
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface ColorProvider
        Parameters:
        weight - between 0 and 1
        value - ignored
        Returns:
        The Color in the gradient
